title: wxPython I: Introduction to GUI Programming
description:
wxPython I: Introduction to GUI Programming

David Goodger

wxPython is an open-source graphical user interface (GUI) toolkit that
runs on multiple platforms, including Linux, Windows, and Mac OS X. By
the end of this tutorial, attendees will have built a simple form-based
application from scratch using wxPython. We will build the application
step by step, discussing the choices and rationale as we go.
